scripts.jekyll: cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o
scripts.jekyll_build: cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.preview: cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd vite && APP_ENV=development vite dev" "cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o"
scripts.deploy: cd vite && APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets
scripts.build: cd vite && APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.vite_dev_win: cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=development vite dev
scripts.vite_build_win: cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=production vite build
scripts.jekyll_win: cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o
scripts.jekyll_build_win: cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build -l -o
scripts.preview_win: cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o
scripts.dev_win: concurrently "cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=development vite dev" "cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve -l -o"
scripts.deploy_win: cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && move dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && del -rf assets && move dist/assets assets
scripts.build_win: cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && move dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && del -rf assets && move dist/assets assets && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
